title: What Happens After We Die? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/4/21
itunes:title: What Happens After We Die? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/4/21
description:
George Noory and theology professor Dr. James Papandrea discuss his theory of what happens after the physical body dies, what realms the soul enters after death, ancient superstitions about death, and whether humans become angels after they die.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
